column5: Hi everyone,  we rented a cottage this summer on lower buckhorn. the people that rented us the cottage were so nice to invite us up next saturday to have a look and see if its up to par for us.  I was wondering if any of you can tell me how the crappie fishing is there, because i'm thinking of bringing the boat  thanks, peps
I dont know about crappie but everything else is good great
There is a couple of bays that will hold crappie... try Black duck bay(north-east end of the lake) But watch out for rocks..
i have had a cottage on Lower Buckhorn for 20 years and only ever caught 1 crappie although I have never really targeted them  Kawartha Kev
